entry.title: Thailand Mass Shooting Victims Included Children as Young as 2
entry.content: One 4-year-old loved jokes and classical Thai dancing. A 2-year-old, nicknamed the “Captain” loved pizza. At the base of one casket, lay a toy dinosaur and plastic trucks.

entry.title: Crimea Bridge Explosion Disrupts Supply Route for Russian Forces
entry.content: The blast partially destroyed a key artery for the movement of fuel, military equipment and food to Russian troops fighting to hold ground in southern Ukraine. Russian officials were quick to blame Kyiv.

entry.title: Solar Rollout Rouses Resistance in Europe's Countryside
entry.content: Europe’s plans to expand solar power in response to soaring energy prices are running into thick rulebooks in France, local opposition in Spain and layers of bureaucracy in Italy.

entry.title: Himars Transform the Battle for Ukraine---and Modern Warfare
entry.content: The mobile, high-precision U.S. rocket system is thwarting Russia’s invasion as it revolutionizes military strategy.
